monitor: 3-in., approx. 921,000-dot, wide viewing angle TFT LCD monitor with anti-reflection coating and 5-level brightness adjustment, tiltable 82° downward, 90° upward
weight: Approx. 1 lb 1.5 oz. (494 g) (including battery and SD memory card)
imagesensor: 1/2.3-in. type CMOS; approx. 12.75 million total pixels
powersources: One Rechargeable Li-ion Battery EN-EL5 (supplied) AC Adapter EH-62A (available separately)
lens: 36x optical zoom, NIKKOR lens; 4.0-144mm (angle of view equivalent to that of 22.5-810 mm lens in 35mm  format); f/3.4-5.7, Digital zoom: up to 4x (angle of view equivalent to that of approx. 3240 mm lens in 35mm  format)
dimensionswxhxd: Approx. 4.6 x 3.3 x 4.1 in. ( 115.5 x 83.7 x 102.5 mm) (excluding projections)
storagemedia: Internal memory (approx. 102 MB), SD/SDHC/SDXC memory card
suppliedaccessories: Camera Strap, Rechargeable Li-ion Battery EN-EL5, Charging AC Adapter EH-69P, USB Cable UC-E6, Audio Video Cable EG-CP16, Lens cap LC-CP23, ViewNX 2 CD-ROM
isosensitivity: ISO 160, 200, 400, 800, 1600, 3200 Auto (auto gain from ISO 160 to 800) High ISO sensitivity auto (ISO 160 to 1600) Fixed range auto (ISO 160 to 200, 160 to 400)
focusrangefromlens: [W]: Approx. 1 ft 8 in. (50 cm) to infinity, [T]: Approx. 7 ft 3 in  (2.2m) to infinity, Macro close-up mode: Approx. 4 in. (10 cm) to infinity (when Flower symbol lights in green and the zoom indicator is on the wide-angle position (triangle symbol), and from approx. 0.4 in. 1 cm to infinity (at three increments from the wide-angle position to the telephoto position)
